Title: Sell surplus grain to the nation to support the construction of national industry!
Publisher: Zhongnan renmin wenyi yinshu chubanshe (中南人民文艺印书出版社)
Notes: The text above the shop, in white characters: 縣第一區供銷合作社 - County First District Distribution Cooperative.The vertical text below: 收購糧食 - Purchases grain.
